code: import React from'react';import{Link,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=_ref=>{let{user,activeUsers,onLogout}=_ref;const location=useLocation();const navItems=[{path:'/tasks',label:'Tasks',icon:'üìã'},{path:'/stats',label:'Analytics',icon:'üìä'},{path:'/focus',label:'Focus',icon:'‚è∞'},{path:'/collaboration',label:'Collaborate',icon:'üë•'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header-left",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"logo",children:"\uFFFD Smart Productivity Dashboard"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"header-nav",children:navItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:item.path,className:"nav-link ".concat(location.pathname===item.path?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-icon",children:item.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"nav-label",children:item.label})]},item.path))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"active-users",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"users-indicator",children:["\uD83D\uDC65 ",activeUsers.length," online"]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"welcome-text",children:["Welcome, ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:user.username})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:onLogout,className:"logout-btn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"\uD83D\uDEAA"}),"Logout"]})]})]})]});};export default Header;
